message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $100. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell it to you for $130.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?
I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell it to you for $125.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $105?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the end of our negotiation, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell it to you for $115.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I really need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product. Please let me know if this is acceptable to you.
